Package suga.engine.game.objects

Class BasicGameObject

java.lang.Object
suga.engine.physics.BasicPhysical
suga.engine.game.objects.BasicGameObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameObject, DrawListener, Physical
public class BasicGameObject extends BasicPhysical implements DrawListener, GameObject
A game object has its own physical position within the world, and a DrawListener to draw it each frame.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • BasicGameObject

      public BasicGameObject()
      Creates a new BasicGameObject with zero vectors and a mass of 1.

    • BasicGameObject

      public BasicGameObject(Vector pos, Vector vel, Vector accel, double mass)
      Creates a new BasicGameObject with the given vel, acceleration, position, and mass.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position to start this object at.
      vel - The initial velocity of this object.
      accel - The acceleration of this object.
      mass - The mass of this object.

    • getDrawListener

      public DrawListener getDrawListener()
      If present, returns the DrawListener associated with this GameObject. May be null.
      Specified by:
      getDrawListener in interface GameObject
      Returns:
      Either the DrawListener attached to this GameObject or null.

    • applyChanges

      public void applyChanges(int width, int height, GraphicsPanel panel)
      Called every drawing frame so programs have a chance to make their voices heard on what gets drawn.
      Specified by:
      applyChanges in interface DrawListener
      Parameters:
      width - The width of the pixel map.

      panel - The panel to apply changes to.
